document.description: Yes because I use my food stamp debit card there all the time. Who accepts food stamps in ... What is William graham's contribution to sociology?

Home Answers.com > Wiki Answers > Categories > History, Politics&Society > Society and Civilization > Welfare > The Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program > Do Fast food places generally accept food stamps? Do Fast food places generally accept food stamps? In: The Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program [ Edit categories ]
Answer:
No. Food stamps cannot be used to purchase ready-made food.
First answer by Kirsten07734 . Last edit by Kirsten07734 . Contributor trust : 281 [ recommend contributor recommended ]. Question popularity : 2 [ recommend question ]. [ report abuse ] Can you answer these The Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program questions?
Do you still pay child support if you are on food stamps? Answer it! What is the bill number for food stamp ban for drug felons? Answer it! When you move to Ky how long does take to get medicaid and food stamps? Answer it! Can you use Mississippi food stamps in Alabama? Answer it! What restaurant in Nashville take food stamps? Answer it!
Relevant answers:
Where do fast food places keep food ? In the fridge or freezer, then it's prepared and usually held in some sort of unit heating cabinet or food warmer until being ordered. Why are fast food places garbage? Fast food can cause serious health problems like obesity and heart problems. What is the healthiest fast food place ? it doesn't exist, sorry What fast food place is the cheapest? MCDONALDS What are the major fast food places ? McDonald's, Wendy's, Burger King, Taco Bell, Subway, Pizza Hut, KFC, Jack-In The Box, Del-Taco, Green Burrito, Quizno's, Carl's Jr., A&W RootBeer, In-N-Out Burgers, SONIC, Popeye's, and a lot...
